mapper.select: SELECT perms FROM t_menu WHERE menu_id IN( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM `t_user_role` AS ur LEFT JOIN t_role_menu AS rm ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} and rm.client_code=#{clientCode})

select DISTINCT t_menu.menu_id,t_menu.menu_name,t_menu.parent_id,t_menu.path,t_menu.perms,t_menu.component,t_menu.menu_type,t_menu.icon,t_menu.order_num from t_menu WHERE menu_id IN( SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM `t_user_role` AS ur LEFT JOIN t_role_menu AS rm ON ur.role_id=rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId}) and t_menu.menu_type!=2 order by t_menu.order_num asc
